website_summaries.verdict: This travel-size version of the larger palette has everything you need for affordable, on-the-go contouring.
pros: Highlight gives a stunning glow without being too shimmery or glittery
A little powder goes a long way
Palette sits at a lower price point
cons: Strong vanilla scent may not appeal to everyone

customer_reviews.title: Nice color group
customer_reviews.text: Nice size compact easy to travel with as it has just what you need with these three shades
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Engle Simsic

customer_reviews.title: I Love this Makeup
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my face looking fresh, glowy, and alive!!. I luv it!
customer_reviews.author: ION STORES

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite contouring pallete! This typically lasts me for 5-6 months before running out.
customer_reviews.author: alg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the highlighter and it really does smell super delicious like other reviews said lol
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good colors
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and it's great for travel. Blends perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: MCM

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s everything I had hoped it would be. :) I absolutely love this travel palette. & it got delivered sooner than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: jenelle

customer_reviews.title: Basic
customer_reviews.text: P I dont like how much it is its traveling set
customer_reviews.author: mandi eaker

customer_reviews.title: Pigment/All day stay
customer_reviews.text: This stays on all day long! The pigment in it is one of the best I've ever used before! Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Great pigmentation.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister and she loves it! Loves the pigmentation.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Yes...buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Smells delicious! Great shades! Goes on smooth and lasts all day. One of my fave pieces 💜
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: No pigment
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely useless product. Had high hopes because of the fantastic reviews but was shocked to find it is not pigmented and will not show up easily on your skin. If you apply more layers, it just looks like sheer yellow or pink glitter that very clearly does not go with your skin tone. Disappears after a couple hours. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
